be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.versioning.branchchooser

Class BranchChooserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.versioning.branchchooser.BranchChooserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BranchChooserListener

    public class BranchChooserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements BranchChooserListener
    This class controls the window to let the user select a branch in which the current branch should be merged in.

      • BranchChooserController

        public BranchChooserController(Project project,
                               java.lang.String parentView,
                               java.lang.String actualBranchName)
                        throws DatabaseConnectionException
        Create the controller for the branch choose.
        Parameters:
        project - current project, on which we create the branch.
        parentView - specific name, to set the view according to what we want. "Merge" to show the merge part. "Branch" to show to branch change part
        actualBranchName - name of the actual branch
        Throws:
        DatabaseConnectionException - exception gotten when database connection fails

        private boolean showDifferences(java.lang.String chosenBranchName,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> deletedInserted)
        Initialize and show the difference View and depending if the user will chose ok or cancel it will merge or not
        Parameters:
        chosenBranchName - the name of the branch select for the merge into the current one
        deletedInserted - the deletes inserted.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the merge was accepted
